item.title: From Intern Project to Production: How I Shipped the Draw Tool for Canva's Present Mode
item.description: ðŸš€ Exciting progress at Canva! A recent blog post details the journey of transforming an intern project into the Draw Tool for Present Mode. The author shares the technical challenges faced and how they were successfully addressed to enhance user experience. Learn about this innovative feature and the engineering practices behind it. #Canva #Engineering #UserExperience #Innovation #TechJourney
